name: Google.com Simple Dark
description: Just a very simple stylesheet that makes as few changes as possible to maintain Google's layout, but switched to a darker background and some font color changes for readability.
additional_info:
v1.02 - Fixed the topbar.

I just got sick of all the other stylesheets where people essentially wreck the layout of Google's nice, minimalist design when all I wanted was a dark background.  Feel free to change as you see fit :)
